description: Explore the impact of non-fungible tokens (NFTs) on the art world for artists. Discover the benefits, challenges, and platforms associated with NFTs, and learn how this technology is reshaping the creation, sale, and ownership of digital art.
keywords: NFTs, non-fungible tokens, artists, digital art, blockchain, art market, royalties, NFT platforms, digital assets, environmental impact
title: Exploring the World of NFTs: A New Frontier for Artists
